dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Demineralized water; DI water; Deionized H2O
Demineralized water; DI water; Deionized H2O
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Deionised water is water that has had its ions removed. It is produced through a process that filters out minerals and ions such as calcium, sodium, iron, copper, chloride, and bromide. It has no set standard compliance but is often produced to meet specific quality criteria required for certain industrial or laboratory processes. Deionised water is typically used in applications where the presence of ions may interfere with machinery, experiments, or manufacturing processes, such as in cooling applications, laboratory tests, or electronics manufacturing. The production route involves ion exchange, reverse osmosis, or distillation. The product may be supplied as part of a production or consumption mix and is available at the production plant or to the consumer.
去离子水是通过去除了其离子的水。它通过过滤掉矿物质及离子如钙、钠、铁、铜、氯化物和溴化物的过程产生。它没有设定的标准遵从性，但通常生产出来以满足某些工业或实验室过程所需的特定质量标准。去离子水通常应用于离子存在可能干扰机械、实验或制造过程的地方，例如在冷却应用、实验室测试或电子制造中。其生产路线包括离子交换、反渗透或蒸馏。该产品可能作为生产或消费混合物供应，且可在生产工厂或消费者那里获得。
